meanings.definition: Not taking part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipating students watched the game from the sidelines.
meanings.sent2: She felt left out when her nonparticipating friends went on a trip without her.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipating squirrel decided to nap instead of joining the other animals in the park.
meanings.sent4: The nonparticipating clouds refused to join the storm, leaving the sky clear and bright.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipating audience members sat quietly, not clapping or cheering.

meanings.definition: Not involved in a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipating employees did not attend the company picnic.
meanings.sent2: He felt like an outsider being the only nonparticipating member of the club.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipating cat chose to stay away from the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: The nonparticipating puzzle piece didn't fit in with the rest, causing frustration.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipating plant missed out on the benefits of being part of the garden community.
